data.name: 0000 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04After you search a point, the singularity will appear as a pin.

data.name: 0001 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04These points are causing the information couplings of space to become unstable.

data.name: 0002 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04They reinforce abnormal space by using Haruhi Suzumiya's desires and fantasies.

data.name: 0003 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04For this reason, singularities come in a variety of different forms.

data.name: 0004 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04By scrubbing the point with the mop that Yuki Nagato enhanced...

data.name: 0006 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04When you rub it with your stylus, the Brigade member will automatically move next to it.

data.name: 0007 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04They will take out the mop and start scrubbing it.

data.name: 0008 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Keep rubbing it with the stylus until the singularity has completely been erased.

data.name: 0010 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...the singularity will automatically restore itself over time.

data.name: 0011 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04This auto recovery can happen in any situation.

data.name: 0012 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04It will even occur during Delay Events, or Accidents.

data.name: 0013 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Please check the top screen before rubbing so you can get the timing right.

data.name: 0014 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04When you're rubbing a singularity, use a wider motion to erase it more efficiently.

data.name: 0015 (583.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Then you will be able to fully erase it.
